metadata.title: Pink Platinum Girls' Puffer Jacket
features: Waterproof quilted puffer jacket with fleece lined body and hood to keep your girls dry, warm and protected during wet weather.
Lightweight and toasty it features an elasticized waist for a snug comfy fit and zipfront with velcro closure for better insulation and extra down-like warmth for those cold blustery days.
Maintains high thermal performance in cold and wet conditions without being heavy or bulky.
Constructed to the highest quality and safety standards to give parents peace of mind
Stylish girls bubble jacket has snap front patch pockets to keep there personal items secure. The perfect layer for those cold blustery days or nights during the fall winter season.
description: Pink Platinum adds the finishing touches to any outfit. Layer up in style with this classic quilted puffer with elasticized waist, soft cheetah print fleece lining and front zip closure with velcro snap reinforcements to keep them cozy and warm this winter season.
